Class AbstractChronoGraphIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.chronos.chronograph.internal.impl.index.AbstractChronoGraphIndex

    Deprecated. 
    Superseded by AbstractChronoGraphIndex2.

    @Deprecated
 @PersistentClass(value="kryo")
public abstract class AbstractChronoGraphIndex
extends java.lang.Object
implements ChronoGraphIndexInternal
    This class represents the definition of a graph index (index metadata) on disk.
